Uses of Class
net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.handler.event.EventAdapterGwt

  • Packages that use EventAdapterGwt 
    Package Description
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.handler.event
    Contains the implementation for event related UI handlers using GWT.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.widget.adapter
    Contains the implementation for widget adapters using GWT.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.widget.complex.adapter
    Contains the implementation for complex widget adapters using GWT.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.widget.field.adapter
    Contains the implementation for field widget adapters using GWT.
    net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.widget.window.adapter
    Contains the implementation for window widget adapters using GWT.

    • Uses of EventAdapterGwt in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.handler.event

      Subclasses of EventAdapterGwt in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.handler.event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EventAdapterGwtClickToChange
      This class extends EventAdapterGwt but fires a EventType.VALUE_CHANGE in case of EventAdapterGwtClickToChange.onClick(ClickEvent).

    • Uses of EventAdapterGwt in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.widget.adapter

      Methods in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.widget.adapter that return EventAdapterGwt 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected EventAdapterGwt UiWidgetAdapterGwt.createEventAdapter(UiFeatureEvent source, UiHandlerEvent sender)
      This method creates the AbstractUiWidgetAdapterWithEvents.getEventAdapter() instance.
      Methods in net.sf.mmm.client.ui.impl.gwt.widget.adapter with parameters of type EventAdapterGwt 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void UiWidgetAdapterGwtWidgetActive.applyEventAdapterForClick(EventAdapterGwt adapter)
      Applies for EventType.CLICK events.
      protected void UiWidgetAdapterGwtWidgetActive.applyEventAdapterForFocus(EventAdapterGwt adapter)
      Applies for EventType.FOCUS_GAIN and EventType.FOCUS_LOSS events.
